com.wolvencraft.yasp.scoreboard

Class Scoreboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.scoreboard.Scoreboard

  • public class Scoreboard
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple wrapper around the Minecraft score boards.
    Until Bukkit pulls its shit together, this is a working solution
    Author:
    bitWolfy
